## Screenshot Library Plan — Corrected with Route Accuracy

Updated the capture plan using the actual routes from `app/src/routes.config.js`. Here's the corrected structure:

### Site Structure (from codebase)

```
split.lease/
├── PUBLIC PAGES
│   ├── /                        ← Homepage
│   ├── /search                  ← Search listings  
│   ├── /view-split-lease/:id    ← Listing detail
│   ├── /quick-match             ← Quick match wizard
│   ├── /list-with-us            ← Host acquisition
│   ├── /faq, /help-center       ← Support
│   └── /about-us, /policies     ← Company
│
├── HOST PAGES (Auth Required)
│   ├── /host-overview           ← Host dashboard ✅ 1 captured
│   ├── /self-listing            ← Create listing wizard
│   ├── /listing-dashboard       ← Manage listing
│   ├── /host-proposals/:userId  ← View proposals
│   ├── /host-leases             ← Manage leases
│   └── /house-manual            ← House manual editor
│
└── GUEST PAGES (Auth Required)
    ├── /guest-proposals/:userId ← Track proposals
    ├── /guest-leases/:userId    ← My leases
    ├── /messages                ← Messaging
    └── /account-profile/:userId ← Profile settings
```

### Files Created/Updated

| File | Purpose |
|------|---------|
| [README.md](orchestrator/assets/screenshots/README.md) | Usage guide with correct routes |
| [_capture-plan.md](orchestrator/assets/screenshots/_capture-plan.md) | 130 screenshots across all journeys |
| [_capture-log.md](orchestrator/assets/screenshots/_capture-log.md) | Tracking when captures are taken |
| [memory.md](orchestrator/memory.md) | Updated with Screenshot Library pattern |

| Guest Journeys (Public) | 12 | 12 | 24 |
